alert.note: Alert for Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 4:22AM EST until January 15 at 12:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow, blowing snow, and cold wind chills. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph, with wind chills of 15 to 25 below zero. Lake effect snow continues, with additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches through this afternoon. Light accumulations are possible through Tuesday. * WHERE...Cass MI, Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until noon EST today. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from noon today to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
